alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 18 at 2:05AM MST until December 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, today through Tuesday night, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Wind Chill Watch, Wednesday morning through Thursday morning, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 6 AM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Wednesday morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Wind chill values may fall to extremely dangerous levels. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Wear a hat and gloves to prevent frostbite.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine
